Friedrichshafen ... Ferdinand von Zeppelin
Am I right?

yes, you're right ... and the construction place of the biggest airplane for a very long period: the Dornier Do X - the Jumbo of the time befor world war II, starting and landing at water ... 

But Sarjevo is a very famous place, too. The place of famous winter olympics and a very special place of history ... and hoepefully: a place of the future. You're always welcome !!!
